fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Single market, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Providing clients with explanatory guidelines as regards REMIT, EMIR and MiFID II implementation process; liaising with the REMIT "Task Force" within the AEEGSI (Italian Authority for Electricity Gas and Water) in order to bring forward group interests both with regard to the current market situation and in the light of prospective developments
goals__remit: Advising EU and non-EU energy companies (mainly traders, but also downstream players) as regards legal and regulatory matters; providing support in order to ensure risk assessment and business development
